Articles.Content: hype hyep heyp
10 to go!!!

> 
> Nothing is too fast for the hype train! Send that throttle to 300%!!

\*regulator, not throttle.

Anyway, if travelling at a googol times the speed of light isn't fast enough for you... \*throws lever up open full, fills firebox with Karbonite-infused hype versions of Doc Brown's Prest-o-logs\*

Bumpy ride ahead!

> 
> Wait we never had rails?

We had them at some point, but not even hype-ium can withstand these speeds.
10 Pages to go!!
everyone go on the atmospheric scattering mod page and yell at Harvestr

> 
> We are at the .90 hype level of pages!

.24 was at 297, don't stop for anything!
We have no website! What will we do!
t-7minutes according to [http://kerbalx.com/countdown](http://kerbalx.com/countdown) !!!

"The Vengabus is Coming, and everyone's jumping, New York to San Francisco..."

Just listen to We Like To Party and imagine a train flying across the universe with everyone one of us forum members in it.
We consumed those to fuel more hype.
Two hundred and ninety pages, record closing in!! HYPE HYPE HYPE, CHOO CHOOOOOOO
Only 10 pages left ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif). At this point we will pass up 1.0 and go straight to 1.1
gotta go hype
rise mighty 300
POST 300 page maybe!

> 
> It lost it's wheels LONG AGO.

We still have our wheels. If your coach has gotten it's wheels torn off, you may request a new set by pulling the wheel lever at the back of the coach.
Is the guitar theme song in the game, or was that just for Das?
Gooooooooooooood morning hype train!!
To those who didn't believe me last week, when I said "we would beat the record for hype threads". This ludicrous speed is your answer!!!!

> 
> t-7minutes according to [http://kerbalx.com/countdown](http://kerbalx.com/countdown) !!!

I can't even refresh that page!

> 
> Moving really fast, hope the wheels stay on.

We don't need no wheels! Gregrox! We need to install HypeLev Repulsors! It should be possible to create pure beams of hype in 11 pages!
Weally weally fast.
is there actually a way to get a legit hard copy of the game. not for playing, just for the shelf
